identity.name: FlowState
identity.description: The AI-powered beat forge for lyricists.

usage.gradients: Use subtle radial gradients for backgrounds (e.g., 'bg-[radial-gradient(ellipse_at_top,_var(--tw-gradient-stops))] from-purple-900/20 via-background to-background'). NEVER use text gradients.
usage.borders: Use 1px borders with 10-20% opacity for structure. 'border-white/10'.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-8, p-12 for sections. p-6 for cards.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or Pill shape. No default rounded-md.
buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95

inputs.style: bg-input/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 h-11

visualizers.waveform: Use canvas or SVG. Primary color: #7C3AED. Secondary: #00F0FF. Height: 128px minimum.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a fixed noise overlay to the entire app: 'fixed inset-0 opacity-[0.03] pointer-events-none z-50 bg-[url("https://grainy-gradients.vercel.app/noise.svg")]'
visual_enhancers.motion: Use framer-motion for page transitions. 'initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}'

hero_bg.usage: Landing page hero background with heavy overlay

feature_mic.usage: Features section or 'Start Recording' card background

universal_guidelines: DARK MODE ONLY: The app should be locked to dark mode. Do not implement a light mode toggle.
NO CENTER ALIGNMENT: Align text to the left by default. Only center headlines if absolutely necessary for balance.
DATA-TESTID: All interactive elements must have a data-testid attribute.
MICRO-INTERACTIONS: Every button must have a hover and active state. Use scale-95 on click.
WAVEFORMS: The waveform is the heart of the app. It should be the most prominent visual element on the studio page.
NO GRADIENT TEXT: Use solid colors for text to maintain readability and 'pro' feel.
GLASSMORPHISM: Use glass effects for floating panels (EQ, Settings) to maintain context of the workspace behind them.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'lucide-react' for icons. 2. Install 'framer-motion' for animations. 3. Configure Tailwind with the colors provided above. 4. Create a 'Layout' component that enforces the dark theme and noise texture. 5. Use the provided image URLs for the specific sections mentioned.
